articles.author: Sean Conlon, Chloe Taylor, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 pops 1%, Dow surges nearly 600 points as Trump calls off Europe tariffs tied to Greenland - CNBC
articles.description: All three major U.S. stock indexes rebounded on Wednesday after President Trump called off new tariffs on Europe.
articles.content:
U.S. equities leaped after Wednesday after President Donald Trump called off new Europe tariffs, saying a deal framework has been reached over Greenland.
Stocks were already rising after the preside… [+3617 chars]

articles.title: EU lawmakers vote to hold up Mercosur trade agreement over legal concerns - AP News
articles.description: European Union lawmakers have voted to hold up a major free trade agreement with the Mercosur group of South American countries over concerns about the legality of the deal. In a vote in Strasbourg, France, the lawmakers narrowly approved sending the EU-Merco…
